description: The Brighton Resort Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Brighton Resort for the snow report
Alexa, ask Brighton Resort for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Brighton Resort
shortDescription: The Brighton Resort Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Brighton Resort.
